miniapp.name: Moneygun
miniapp.subtitle: Airdrops for Farcaster.
miniapp.description: A mini-app for Farcaster to create and manage token airdrops with various eligibility criteria. Clean, minimalist design for easy configuration.
miniapp.tagline: Effortlessly create and manage token airdrops.
miniapp.ogDescription: Create and manage token airdrops with flexible eligibility criteria directly on Farcaster.
